thoughts.text: I want to find a good camping spot for my next adventure. I can use the 'google' command to search for the best camping locations in the area.
thoughts.reasoning: Using Google to search for the best camping locations in the area will provide me with a list of options to choose from and help me make an informed decision.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'google' command to search for the best camping locations in the area
- Look for locations that fit my specific needs and preferences
- Take notes on important information to remember
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not just blindly following the recommendations of others. I need to make sure that the camping location I choose is a good fit for me and my goals of exploring the world.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'google' command to search for the best camping locations in the area and find a location that fits my specific needs and preferences.
